channel.title: Posts on Erik R. Vickstrom, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Erik R. Vickstrom, PhD

item.title: How Well--Still Good? Assessing the Validity of Self-Reported English Ability
item.description: Results of my analysis suggest that the English-ability question does a good job of measuring English ability.

item.title: Winner of the 2015 Maria Ioannis Baganha Dissertation Award
item.description: I’m honored to be selected as the winner of IMISCOE’s 2015 Maria Ioannis Baganha Dissertation Award
